attributes.action: To openly admit  that sustaining an ecconomy on house prices was a dire mistake
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Is it not obvious to all that if you are buying a house for 250000 pounds that it is not worth the price?
When you consider the fact you could buy land pay for a construction crew to  build an identical house for a fraction of the price.Admit it was a mistake to create a boom in the ecconomy on house prices

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
